mapper.select: SELECT car_id, plate_no, spec FROM tab_car WHERE user_id IS NULL
SELECT c.car_id, plate_no, spec, c.user_id, name, gender, avatar, age FROM tab_user u JOIN tab_car c ON u.user_id = c.user_id AND user_type = 1 WHERE car_id = #{carId};

SELECT c.car_id, plate_no, spec, c.user_id, NAME, gender, avatar, age FROM tab_user u JOIN tab_car c ON u.user_id = c.user_id AND user_type = 1 AND car_id NOT IN ( SELECT car_id FROM tab_task WHERE start_time NOT BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND end_time NOT BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND `status` NOT IN (0, 1) )
SELECT c.car_id, plate_no, spec, c.user_id, NAME, gender, avatar, age FROM tab_user u JOIN tab_car c ON u.user_id = c.user_id AND user_type = 1 WHERE plate_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{plate}, '%')
SELECT c.car_id, plate_no, spec, c.user_id, NAME, gender, avatar, age FROM tab_user u JOIN tab_car c ON u.user_id = c.user_id AND user_type = 1 WHERE u.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
